constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: KEYACH Name: Tolworth Key Area of Change
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

description: Application for a Non-Matererial Amendment to Planning Permission ref: 17/16928/HOU (Erection of single storey rear wrap-around extension) dated 29/01/2018. Amendment to incorporate change to rooflight
decision_conditions: The Council considers the amendments to be non-material and as such, it is recommended that a S96A application for a non-material amendment be granted.

The deed of variation seeks to increase the number of affordable rented units from 8 to 9 at the cost of the delivery of a shared ownership unit. However, whilst there would be a policy conflict in terms of affordable housing mix, given the overriding need for affordable rented units, on this occasion the change is considered to be acceptable.As such, permission is granted to vary the Legal agreement in the terms set out in the application.

The Design and Access Statement refers to the home for a maximum of 6 children, when the application form states maximum of 5 children. Please clarify if the Design and Access Statement, or the Application Form, should be amended and submit a revised copy if necessary.
